titleText: Microsoft is being forced to build its own power station in Dublin
mainText: Microsoft is being forced to build its own powerstation in Dublin for its data centres because the local electricity grid can't cope, according to The Irish Independent. The US tech giant is planning to install 16.

titleText: How Microsoft Is Hiding Inside Apple
mainText: As Apple rolls out the latest version of iOS to the public, developers around the world are updating applications to iOS 11, ensuring both continuity and compatibility of the code as well as keeping users.
